text: A Silent VoiceFeeling really low today  The last   years of my life has been a shit show and today I really wanted to just disappear because I can no longer tell if I m ever going to pull myself out of this mess   i ve deleted my story twice now   My experience seem ridiculous  I feel like an imposter  As if I myself am deserving of yet another bad turn of events   I watched this anime film  A Silent Voice  and it gave me a small glimmer of hope for myself   Even though I wanted to die so badly this morning  my child depends on me   Even if I feel like everyone has given up on me  this dumb kid never has Even though this last year has gone by so fast and I m stuck in this constant battle against ending up homeless again  I can t change any of these things if I kill myself i m just so tired of being a burden to others and suffering in silence
summary: The last year of my life has been a nightmare. I deleted my story twice now. I watched the anime film A Silent Voice and it gave me a small glimmer of hope for myself. My child depends on me even though I feel like everyone has given up on me.
cleaned: year life nightmare delete story twice watch anime film silent voice give small glimmer hope child depend feel like give

text: Is it ok to tell my friends I ve been feeling suicidal I m not sure if this is the correct sub to post  I posted on r mentalhealth too  but I ve been going through radical ups and downs these days  When I m at my worst I get suicidal and I recently had such an episode  I tried to cut ties with my friends and it sounded a lot like a suicide note but they haven t picked up because they thought I meant I simply need a break and will be moving on in life  we ve been getting a bit distant lately Now I feel really bad that I left on such terms  Should I just let this be and not contact my old friends anymore or should I try to reconcile  If I do reconcile is it wrong to tell them the reason I left was because I was suicidal  I hate making others worried and bothering them  especially as I know some of them are dealing with mental health issues themselves  I would never want to trigger or upset someone  Then again  during these days when I m feeling more lucid  I start fearing that I might actually do something when I hit another low  I just hate feeling like the whole world hates me and wants me gone  and that I can t even tell anyone because they probably think I m better off dead anyway because I m such a burden  What should I do
summary: Mental health issues make me feel suicidal. Recently I tried to cut ties with my friends. They didn't pick up on it because they thought it was a suicide note. Now I feel bad that I left on such terms. I hate feeling like the whole world hates me and wants me gone.

text: I don t really see things getting any betterIn the midst of a health crisis  my employer decided to force me to take an unpaid leave of absence   They decided I wasn t going to be productive enough with the medical care I m requiring at the moment  but didn t say who this decision came from  My reporting manager did not agree with this decision  and was unaware it was even being discussed until I told her They refuse to pay out my time off so I can keep an income for the next month  If they don t terminate me  that money isn t owed to me  I m simply sitting on their payroll  unused  I can t file for unemployment this way  either They refuse to give me the time I need to have a doctor clear me for short term disability or FMLA  In fact  they gave me   hours to accomplish this  which is nowhere near enough time   It would take at least two weeks based on my doctor s estimate Nobody is hiring right now  I can t do physical labor  because of my medical condition  I can t lift over   lbs  It s unsafe for me to work with the general public  at least until an official diagnosis is made   Really at a loss and as stupid as it sounds  feeling betrayed  They obviously don t care if I have a roof over my head or can put food in my stomach
summary: In the midst of a health crisis, my employer forced me to take an unpaid leave of absence. They refuse to pay out my time off so I can keep an income for the next month. They don't give me the time to have a doctor clear me for short term disability or FMLA.
cleaned: midst health crisis employer force unpaid leave absence refuse pay time income month not time doctor clear short term disability fla
